section.title: Xinerama
section.para: Enables Xinerama support if the boolean argument is true and disables it if the argument is false. Calling this command without arguments turns on Xinerama support if it was disabled before and turns it off if it was enabled. For example:
section.programlisting: # Turn Xinerama support on, use primary screen 2 2 Xinerama on # Turn it off again Xinerama off
